text: Do you like to help good causes?
Yeah I do like to help people with good causes. What about you?
Yes and I found a really good one. Are you interested in helping us?
Well I am interested in hearing what you have to say, but I don't know if I will help you yet. What is the cause?
Well I hope I can help you change your mind. It is Save The Children. Have you heard of them?
I have not heard of them. What is the organization about?
Every donation made helps children to have better health, education, safety, and their families as well. Isn't that wonderful?
That is a very wonderful cause, but is this a nonprofit or for profit organization?
It is a nonprofit organization. All money except 1% goes straight to the children and families.
Well that's definitely very comforting. I know that some charities keep a lot of the money for themselves. Are these children from around the globe or just a specific country?
The 1% is for overhead. That's understandable I'm sure. We help everywhere we are able too, so many countries.
Oh yeah definitely and that's good. How young and old are the children that get this help?
They are newborn to 18 years old.
Oh cool well that's good that everyone is included. How much of a donation would I need to make to make a difference?
You can donate from $0 to $2 of your payment. Is that doable?
hmm yeah that is doable, but what amount will be enough to help?
Even twenty-five cents will help.
Oh well that's good. I was just making sure that even a little will help.
But would you like to double that to fifty cents?
Yeah I could definitely double that to 50 cents.
Ok. I will take your donation of fifty cents and give to them. Thank you.
Thank you for taking the 50 cents out and you're very welcome. Have a good day.
